alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Putnam, southeastern Paulding and northern Van Wert Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Payne, or 13 miles north of Van Wert, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph along with heavy downpours. Road ponding and localized nuisance flooding is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Paulding around 935 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Continental. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
